name: Tennis 105
description:
The Tennis 105 app is an iOS app that allows tennis players to easily keep score while playing 105! With a designated scorekeeper and the 105 app, you will never need to do the mental math of keeping score during a fast paced 105 game!

This is a fun, fast paced doubles game that emphasizes aggressive play. In this game, it's 2 vs. 2. A groundstroke winner is worth 10 points, volley winner is 20 points, an overhead winner is 30 points. A shot in the net costs 5 points, and a shot hit out costs 1 point. Tweeners and pegs are worth 50 points each. First team to 105 total points wins. All shots can be toggled on and off based on personal/coach preference.
